author: ebrondol
body:
In order to make the code compatible with phase2, the PixelDQM code is run just for the modules belonging to the pixel subdetector (barrel and endcap), instead of running on the entire GeomDets vector.
The main point is that this part of the code is dedicated to the pixel subdet, NOT to all the modules that are declared to be pixels - in phase2 can be also outer tracker.

Nb. the white rubbit check cannot be used in this moment, but with a simple printout I have checked that the modules number(and the detIds) are the same as before.

@fioriNTU
title: Running on just pixel subdet in PixelDQM
